all_questions.question: What happens to metrics as the quality of participating systems increases?
all_questions.context: They are good across the whole set of participating systems, but as you move towards the best systems, the metrics will not allow you to distinguish which of them is the best.

selected_questions.question: What happens to metrics as the quality of participating systems increases?
